item.title: Game!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

gokon:

[quote]Line 137: [Error] (137:1): Unknown identifier ‘GetApplication’ in script[/quote] help?

Use SCAR 2.03 to run this. SCAR Divi has removed a few components. So just delete “GetApplication.” and that will fix the problem.

item.title: Game!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Oops sorry. Change the = 0 to = 2 and it works.

begin
  repeat
  Setup;
  SafeInitForm2;
  FreeForm(frmDesign2);
  prog;
  until GetApplication.Messagebox('Want to play again?', 'Again', 1) = 2;
end.

Read full topic

i tryd that right now and cliked cancel and it still made it pop up :0

Read full topic

item.title: Game!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Nice revision nueb35.

You can replace your being/end with this and you won’t have to include that second form.

begin
  repeat
  Setup;
  SafeInitForm2;
  FreeForm(frmDesign2);
  prog;
  until GetApplication.Messagebox('Want to play again?', 'Again', 1) = 0;
end.

And you can also set MaxLengths for Edit Boxes. Such as… Edit1.MaxLength := 3; The maximum number of characters you are able to put into that edit box is 3. That way people don’t pick numbers like 120,000,000,000,000 or something.

Last thing

number := random(100);

That will only pick numbers from 0 to 99. If you want the numbers to really be in between 0 and 100 then that line should be…

number := random(99) + 1;

~Ron

Read full topic

item.title: Game!
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

how about this

[code]{[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]
[]] This is a copy of a game stealth made in visual basics, [[]
[]] but the diference is that this was made by scar. [[]
[]] [[]
[]] A special thanks to Ron for helping me with the random part. [[]
[]] [[]
[]] Nothing needs to be set up. Just run it and have fun. [[]
[]] [[]
[]] DO NOT MESS WITH ANYTHING UNDER THIS [[]
[]] [[]
[]] []] [] [] [] [][][][] [][][] [][][][] [][][][] [[]
[]] [][] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [[]
[]] [] [] [] [] [] [][][] [][][] [][] [][][][] [[]
[]] [] [][] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [[]
[]] [] [[] [][][] [][][][] [][][] [][][][] [][][][] [[]
[]] [[]
[]] By: Nueb35 [[]
[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]}
program Game;
var
frmDesign2: TForm;
frmDesign3: TForm;
Label1: TLabel;
Label2: TLabel;
Label3: TLabel;
Label4: TLabel;
Label5: TLabel;
Label6: Tlabel;
Memo1: TMemo;
Edit1: TEdit;
Button1: TButton;
Button3: TButton;
button4: TButton;
number, tries: integer;
v: TVariantArray;
start,yes,compleate:boolean;
g:string;

procedure ButtonClick3(sender: TObject);
begin
SetArrayLength(V, 0);
end;
procedure prog;
begin
if(start=true)then
begin
cleardebug;
writeln(’[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]’);
writeln(’[]] Congratulations you have found the number in ‘+inttostr(tries)+’ tries. [[]’);
writeln(’[]] Thsi was braught to u by Nueb35 with some help from Ron. [[]’);
writeln(’[]] [[]’);
writeln(’[]] www.Run3H4x.net [[]’);
writeln(’[]] Let the ownage begin. [[]’);
writeln(’[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]’);
end else
begin
cleardebug;
writeln(’[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]’);
writeln(’[]] Sorry but u did not find the number or closed the form. [[]’);
writeln(’[]] Thsi was braught to u by Nueb35 with some help from Ron. [[]’);
writeln(’[]] [[]’);
writeln(’[]] www.Run3H4x.net [[]’);
writeln(’[]] Let the ownage begin. [[]’);
writeln(’[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]’);
end;
end;
procedure Wow(sender:Tobject);
begin
yes:=true;
frmDesign3.ModalResult := 1;
end;
procedure Wow2(sender:Tobject);
begin
yes:=false;
frmDesign3.ModalResult := 1;
end;
procedure num3;
begin
frmDesign3 := CreateForm;
frmDesign3.Left := 285;
frmDesign3.Top := 205;
frmDesign3.Width := 200;
frmDesign3.Height := 140;
frmDesign3.Caption := ‘Would you like to play again?’;
frmDesign3.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign3.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign3.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign3.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign3.Font.Style := [fsBold];
frmDesign3.Visible := False;
frmDesign3.PixelsPerInch := 100;
Label5 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign3);
Label5.Parent := frmDesign3;
Label5.Left := 18;
Label5.Top := 8;
Label5.Width := 75;
Label5.Height := 13;
Label5.Caption := ‘Would u like to play again?’;
Button3 := TButton.Create(frmDesign3);
Button3.OnClick := @wow;
Button3.Parent := frmDesign3;
Button3.Left := 100;
Button3.Top := 50;
Button3.Width := 75;
Button3.Height := 25;
Button3.Caption := ‘Yes’;
Button3.TabOrder := 1;
Button4 := TButton.Create(frmDesign3);
Button4.OnClick := @wow2;
Button4.Parent := frmDesign3;
Button4.Left := 10;
Button4.Top := 50;
Button4.Width := 75;
Button4.Height := 25;
Button4.Caption := ‘No’;
Button4.TabOrder := 1;
end;
procedure ButtonClick2(sender: TObject);
begin
if (StrToInt(Edit1.Text) > Number) then
begin
Label4.Caption := ‘Too high’;
with Memo1 do
Lines.add(edit1.text);
tries := tries + 1;
Label6.Caption := 'Try number: ’ + inttostr(tries);
end else if (StrToInt(Edit1.Text) < Number) then
begin
Label4.Caption := ‘Too low’;
with Memo1 do
Lines.add(edit1.text);
tries := tries + 1;
Label6.Caption := 'Try number: ’ + inttostr(tries);
end else if (Edit1.Text = inttostr(number)) then
begin
if (tries > 1) then
begin
g := ‘congratulations you found the number in ’ + inttostr(tries) + ’ tries.’;
end else
if (tries = 1) then
begin
g := ‘congratulations you found the number in ’ + inttostr(tries) + ’ try.’;
end;
start:=true;
GetApplication.Messagebox(g,‘Well Done’, 0);
SetArrayLength(V, 0);
frmDesign2.ModalResult := 1;
compleate:=true;
end;
end;

procedure num2;
begin
frmDesign2 := CreateForm;
frmDesign2.Left := 285;
frmDesign2.Top := 205;
frmDesign2.Width := 370;
frmDesign2.Height := 292;
frmDesign2.Caption := ‘Game’;
frmDesign2.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign2.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign2.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign2.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign2.Font.Style := [fsBold];
frmDesign2.Visible := False;
frmDesign2.PixelsPerInch := 100;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign2);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign2;
Label1.Left := 5;
Label1.Top := 8;
Label1.Width := 75;
Label1.Height := 13;
Label1.Caption := ‘Numbers Tried’;
Label3 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign2);
Label3.Parent := frmDesign2;
Label3.Left := 100;
Label3.Top := 65;
Label3.Width := 225;
Label3.Height := 13;
Label3.Caption := ‘I’‘m thinking of a number between 0 and 100.’;
Label6 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign2);
Label6.Parent := frmDesign2;
Label6.Left := 270;
Label6.Top := 8;
Label6.Width := 225;
Label6.Height := 13;
Label6.Caption := 'Try number: ’ + inttostr(tries);
Label2 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign2);
Label2.Parent := frmDesign2;
Label2.Left := 138;
Label2.Top := 83;
Label2.Width := 174;
Label2.Height := 13;
Label2.Caption := ‘What number am I thinking of?’;
Label4 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign2);
Label4.Parent := frmDesign2;
Label4.Left := 200;
Label4.Top := 165;
Label4.Width := 75;
Label4.Height := 13;
Label4.Caption := ‘’;
Label4.Visible := true;
Memo1 := TMemo.Create(frmDesign2);
Memo1.Parent := frmDesign2;
Memo1.Left := 1;
Memo1.Top := 24;
Memo1.Width := 95;
Memo1.Height := 233;
Memo1.TabOrder := 99999;
Memo1.ReadOnly := True;
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign2);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign2;
Edit1.Left := 150;
Edit1.Top := 103;
Edit1.Width := 153;
Edit1.Height := 23;
Edit1.TabOrder := 0;
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign2);
Button1.OnClick := @ButtonClick2;
Button1.Parent := frmDesign2;
Button1.Left := 185;
Button1.Top := 135;
Button1.Width := 75;
Button1.Height := 25;
Button1.Caption := ‘Submit’;
Button1.TabOrder := 1;
end;

procedure ShowFormModal2;
begin
frmDesign2.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeInitForm2;
begin
ThreadSafeCall(‘num2’, v);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal2’, v);
end;

procedure Setup;
begin
number := random(100);
tries := 1;
SetArrayLength(V, 0);
compleate:=false;
yes:=false;
end;

procedure ShowFormModal3;
begin
frmDesign3.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeInitForm3;
begin
ThreadSafeCall(‘num3’, v);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal3’, v);
end;

begin
repeat
Setup;
SafeInitForm2;
FreeForm(frmDesign2);
prog;
if(compleate=true)then
begin
SafeInitForm3;
FreeForm(frmDesign3);
end;
until yes = false;
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Game!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

redragonje65:

I got 1 in 0 tries! makes no sense though. it should say 1 try or first try.

Ya I just noticed that error too.

Look for this:

if (Edit1.Text = inttostr(number)) then

Right after the begin, add:

tries := tries + 1;

That fixes the bug. Also instead of closing the whole form when someone gets it right, how about you are able to Play Again?

Oh and you didn’t use the procedure num3, ShowFormModal3;, SafeInitForm3, ButtonClick3. Once you get rid of those procedures you can also dispose of these variables: Label5, Button3, and frmDesign3. And you can get rid of FreeForm(frmDesign3); at the end of the script.

Thanks for crediting me, and cool script man.

Read full topic

item.title: Game!
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

sure y not xD

[code]{[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]
[]] This is a copy of a game stealth made in visual basics, [[]
[]] but the diference is that this was made by scar. [[]
[]] [[]
[]] A special thanks to Ron for helping me with the random part. [[]
[]] [[]
[]] Nothing needs to be set up. Just run it and have fun. [[]
[]] [[]
[]] DO NOT MESS WITH ANYTHING UNDER THIS [[]
[]] [[]
[]] []] [] [] [] [][][][] [][][] [][][][] [][][][] [[]
[]] [][] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [[]
[]] [] [] [] [] [] [][][] [][][] [][] [][][][] [[]
[]] [] [][] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [[]
[]] [] [[] [][][] [][][][] [][][] [][][][] [][][][] [[]
[]] [[]
[]] By: Nueb35 [[]
[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]}
program Game;
var
frmDesign2: TForm;
frmDesign3: TForm;
Label1: TLabel;
Label2: TLabel;
Label3: TLabel;
Label4: TLabel;
Label5: TLabel;
Label6: Tlabel;
Memo1: TMemo;
Edit1: TEdit;
Button1: TButton;
Button3: TButton;
number, tries: integer;
v: TVariantArray;
start:boolean;
g:string;

procedure ButtonClick3(sender: TObject);
begin
SetArrayLength(V, 0);
frmDesign3.ModalResult := 1;
end;
procedure prog;
begin
if(start=true)then
begin
cleardebug;
writeln(’[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]’);
writeln(’[]] Congratulations you have found the number in ‘+inttostr(tries)+’ tries. [[]’);
writeln(’[]] Thsi was braught to u by Nueb35 with some help from Ron. [[]’);
writeln(’[]] [[]’);
writeln(’[]] www.Run3H4x.net [[]’);
writeln(’[]] Let the ownage begin. [[]’);
writeln(’[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]’);
end else
begin
cleardebug;
writeln(’[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]’);
writeln(’[]] Sorry but u did not find the number or closed the form. [[]’);
writeln(’[]] tries:’+inttostr(tries)+’ [[]’);
writeln(’[]] [[]’);
writeln(’[]] www.Run3H4x.net [[]’);
writeln(’[]] Let the ownage begin. [[]’);
writeln(’[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]’);
end;
end;
procedure num3;
begin
frmDesign3 := CreateForm;
frmDesign3.Left := 285;
frmDesign3.Top := 205;
frmDesign3.Width := 300;
frmDesign3.Height := 186;
frmDesign3.Caption := ‘Game’;
frmDesign3.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign3.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign3.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign3.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign3.Font.Style := [fsBold];
frmDesign3.Visible := False;
frmDesign3.PixelsPerInch := 100;
Label5 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign3);
Label5.Parent := frmDesign3;
Label5.Left := 11;
Label5.Top := 44;
Label5.Width := 225;
Label5.Height := 13;
Button3 := TButton.Create(frmDesign3);
Button3.OnClick := @ButtonClick3;
Button3.Parent := frmDesign3;
Button3.Left := 96;
Button3.Top := 76;
Button3.Width := 75;
Button3.Height := 25;
Button3.Caption := ‘Ok’;
Button3.TabOrder := 1;
end;

procedure ShowFormModal3;
begin
frmDesign3.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeInitForm3;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘num3’, v);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal3’, v);
end;

procedure ButtonClick2(sender: TObject);
begin
if (StrToInt(Edit1.Text) > Number) then
begin
Label4.Caption := ‘Too high’;
with Memo1 do
Lines.add(edit1.text);
tries := tries + 1;
Label6.Caption := 'Tries: ’ + inttostr(tries);
end else if (StrToInt(Edit1.Text) < Number) then
begin
Label4.Caption := ‘Too low’;
with Memo1 do
Lines.add(edit1.text);
tries := tries + 1;
Label6.Caption := 'Tries: ’ + inttostr(tries);
end else if (Edit1.Text = inttostr(number)) then
begin
if (tries > 1) then
begin
g := ‘congratulations you found the number in ’ + inttostr(tries) + ’ tries.’;
end else
if (tries < 2) then
begin
g := ‘congratulations you found the number in ’ + inttostr(tries) + ’ try.’;
end;
GetApplication.Messagebox(g,‘Well Done’, 0);
SetArrayLength(V, 0);
frmDesign2.ModalResult := 1;
start:=true;
end;
end;

procedure num2;
begin
frmDesign2 := CreateForm;
frmDesign2.Left := 285;
frmDesign2.Top := 205;
frmDesign2.Width := 370;
frmDesign2.Height := 292;
frmDesign2.Caption := ‘Game’;
frmDesign2.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign2.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign2.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign2.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign2.Font.Style := [fsBold];
frmDesign2.Visible := False;
frmDesign2.PixelsPerInch := 100;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign2);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign2;
Label1.Left := 5;
Label1.Top := 8;
Label1.Width := 75;
Label1.Height := 13;
Label1.Caption := ‘Numbers Tried’;
Label3 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign2);
Label3.Parent := frmDesign2;
Label3.Left := 100;
Label3.Top := 65;
Label3.Width := 225;
Label3.Height := 13;
Label3.Caption := ‘I’‘m thinking of a number between 0 and 100.’;
Label6 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign2);
Label6.Parent := frmDesign2;
Label6.Left := 300;
Label6.Top := 10;
Label6.Width := 225;
Label6.Height := 13;
Label6.Caption := 'Tries: ’ + inttostr(tries);
Label2 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign2);
Label2.Parent := frmDesign2;
Label2.Left := 138;
Label2.Top := 83;
Label2.Width := 174;
Label2.Height := 13;
Label2.Caption := ‘What number am I thinking of?’;
Label4 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign2);
Label4.Parent := frmDesign2;
Label4.Left := 200;
Label4.Top := 165;
Label4.Width := 75;
Label4.Height := 13;
Label4.Caption := ‘’;
Label4.Visible := true;
Memo1 := TMemo.Create(frmDesign2);
Memo1.Parent := frmDesign2;
Memo1.Left := 1;
Memo1.Top := 24;
Memo1.Width := 95;
Memo1.Height := 233;
Memo1.TabOrder := 99999;
Memo1.ReadOnly := True;
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign2);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign2;
Edit1.Left := 150;
Edit1.Top := 103;
Edit1.Width := 153;
Edit1.Height := 23;
Edit1.TabOrder := 0;
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign2);
Button1.OnClick := @ButtonClick2;
Button1.Parent := frmDesign2;
Button1.Left := 185;
Button1.Top := 135;
Button1.Width := 75;
Button1.Height := 25;
Button1.Caption := ‘Submit’;
Button1.TabOrder := 1;
end;

procedure ShowFormModal2;
begin
frmDesign2.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeInitForm2;
begin
SetArrayLength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘num2’, v);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal2’, v);
end;

procedure Setup;
begin
number := random(100);
tries := 0;
end;

begin
Setup;
SafeInitForm2;
FreeForm(frmDesign3);
FreeForm(frmDesign2);
prog;
end.[/code]

item.title: Game!
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

this is a copy of a game my friend stealth made in visual basics a special thx to ron for helping me with the random number part

[code]{[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]
[]] This is a copy of a game stealth made in visual basics, [[]
[]] but the diference is that this was made by scar. [[]
[]] [[]
[]] A special thanks to Ron for helping me with the random part. [[]
[]] [[]
[]] Nothing needs to be set up. Just run it and have fun. [[]
[]] [[]
[]] DO NOT MESS WITH ANYTHING UNDER THIS [[]
[]] [[]
[]] []] [] [] [] [][][][] [][][] [][][][] [][][][] [[]
[]] [][] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [[]
[]] [] [] [] [] [] [][][] [][][] [][] [][][][] [[]
[]] [] [][] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [[]
[]] [] [[] [][][] [][][][] [][][] [][][][] [][][][] [[]
[]] [[]
[]] By: Nueb35 [[]
[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]}
program Game;
var
frmDesign2: TForm;
frmDesign3: TForm;
Label1: TLabel;
Label2: TLabel;
Label3: TLabel;
Label4: TLabel;
Label5: TLabel;
Label6: Tlabel;
Memo1: TMemo;
Edit1: TEdit;
Button1: TButton;
Button3: TButton;
number, tries: integer;
v: TVariantArray;
start:boolean;
g:string;

procedure ButtonClick3(sender: TObject);
begin
SetArrayLength(V, 0);

end;
procedure prog;
begin
if(start=true)then
begin
cleardebug;
writeln(’[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]’);
writeln(’[]] Congratulations you have found the number in ‘+inttostr(tries)+’ tries. [[]’);
writeln(’[]] Thsi was braught to u by Nueb35 with some help from Ron. [[]’);
writeln(’[]] [[]’);
writeln(’[]] www.Run3H4x.net [[]’);
writeln(’[]] Let the ownage begin. [[]’);
writeln(’[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]’);
end else
begin
cleardebug;
writeln(’[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]’);
writeln(’[]] Sorry but u did not find the number or closed the form. [[]’);
writeln(’[]] tries:’+inttostr(tries)+’ [[]’);
writeln(’[]] [[]’);
writeln(’[]] www.Run3H4x.net [[]’);
writeln(’[]] Let the ownage begin. [[]’);
writeln(’[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]’);
end;
end;

procedure ButtonClick2(sender: TObject);
begin
if (StrToInt(Edit1.Text) > Number) then
begin
Label4.Caption := ‘Too high’;
with Memo1 do
Lines.add(edit1.text);
tries := tries + 1;
Label6.Caption := 'Tries: ’ + inttostr(tries);
end else if (StrToInt(Edit1.Text) < Number) then
begin
Label4.Caption := ‘Too low’;
with Memo1 do
Lines.add(edit1.text);
tries := tries + 1;
Label6.Caption := 'Tries: ’ + inttostr(tries);
end else if (Edit1.Text = inttostr(number)) then
begin
if (tries > 1) then
begin
g := ‘congratulations you found the number in ’ + inttostr(tries) + ’ tries.’;
end else
if (tries < 2) then
begin
g := ‘congratulations you found the number in ’ + inttostr(tries) + ’ try.’;
end;
GetApplication.Messagebox(g,‘Well Done’, 0);
SetArrayLength(V, 0);
frmDesign2.ModalResult := 1;
start:=true;
end;
end;
